org.electrocodeogram.core
Class Core

java.lang.Object
  org.electrocodeogram.core.Core

public class Core
extends java.lang.Object

This is the root and main class of the ECG Server & Lab component. During its initilisation it creates all other core ECG components. It alos provides a console for logging output and reading input commands. It is implemented as a singleton class that gives centralized access to all components.

Method Summary
 Configurator getConfigurator()
          The main GUI component is accessible through this method.
 GuiEventWriter getGuiEventWriter()
           
static Core getInstance()
          This method return sthe singleton instance of the Core object, which is primarily used to get access to other ECG components.
 ModuleRegistry getModuleRegistry()
          This method returns a reference to the ModuleRegistry component, which is managing installed and running modules.
 MsdtManager getMsdtManager()
          This method returns a reference to the MicroSensorDataTypeManager (MsdtManager) component, which is a registry for legal types of event data.
 SensorShellWrapper getSensorShellWrapper()
          This is returning a reference to the SensorShellWrapper, which validates all incoming event data.
